reviewText: I enjoyed this movie very much. It helped me to know more about this Italian beauty. She was a very special actress.
As a man who will be forever in love with this very beautiful and sexy woman I will tell you that this is one very good work on the woman.
Fine story of Sophia Loren. With good commentary by co-stars like Tab Hunter. Real talent lasts and Sophia Loren is a big star to this day. Learned much about her that I did not know.
